SoroiLions.overview: About this PackageCategory Rate per PersonADULT(pps) Ksh 161,780SRS Ksh 25,200CHILD SHARING Ksh 95,775Book Now Validity Oct  19th Dec 2024Duration 2 NightsAccomodation FullboardPricing Single/Per Person SharingTransport Return Ticket
SoroiLions.inclusions: IncludedFull board meal plan including  Breakfast, lunch & dinner. 2 nights accommodation at hotel of choice. Rates are based on Per Person Sharing. Single Room Supplement (SRS) applies. Coffee, tea and filtered water, all soft drinks, local beer, selected spirits and house wines. Twice daily shared & scheduled game drives in custom built 4*4 safari vehicles with an English-speaking safari Guide. One Sundowner One night game drive. One 30-minute Neck & shoulder massage. Return seat in aircraft flights from Wilson Airport Transfers to/from Taita Airstrip Conservation Levy Minimum 4 adults travelling. ExcludedTransfer to/from Nairobi Wilson Airport Conservancy fees @ Ksh 300 per citizen adult per night and Ksh 1,000 per resident adult per night. Beverages not mentioned Extra meals Additional activities Gratuities & tips and items of a personal natureT&C’s:Subject to availability at the time of booking. Supplement for 2 adults travelling @ Ksh 46,800 per person (flying package)
